item.title: 据说 Allegro 吸引了安森美半导体的收购兴趣
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Allegro Microsystems 公司正吸引更大的竞争对手安森美半导体公司的收购兴趣。【原文：Allegro Microsystems Inc. is drawing takeover interest from larger competitor ON Semiconductor Corp., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 投资者正在新兴市场寻找特朗普的 "保险箱
item.description: 从中国人工智能的成功到迪拜移民带动的繁荣，以及委内瑞拉和黎巴嫩债务重组前景的上升，2025 年新兴市场的成功交易都有助于投资者抵御唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易议程。【原文：From China’s artificial-intelligence successes to Dubai’s immigrant-led boom and rising prospects of debt restructuring in Venezuela and Lebanon, the winning emerging-market trades of 2025 all help investors withstand President Donald Trump’s trade agenda.】

item.title: 受降息刺激，2 月份澳大利亚房价反弹
item.description: 由于预期储备银行将在两周前实施四年多来的首次降息，购房者纷纷涌入市场，澳大利亚房价在上个月出现反弹。【原文：Australian house prices rebounded last month as buyers jumped into the market in anticipation of the first interest-rate cut in more than four years which the Reserve Bank then delivered two weeks ago.】

item.title: 苹果在人工智能领域的努力达到了决定成败的关键点
item.description: 亚马逊新推出的 Alexa 系统暴露了苹果公司在人工智能方面的不足，现在苹果公司正处于生死存亡的关头。还有蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook）与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的交易内幕，iPad Air 在更新前出现短缺，M4 MacBook Air 即将推出。此外，不要指望苹果会很快放弃 DEI 的努力。【原文：Amazon’s new Alexa has exposed the AI shortcomings of Apple, which is now at a make-or-break point. Also: An inside look at Tim Cook’s trade with President Donald Trump, the iPad Air sees shortages ahead of a pending refresh, and the M4 MacBook Air is about to launch. Plus, don’t expect Apple to drop its DEI effort anytime soon.】

item.title: 马来西亚前总理伊斯梅尔卷入贪污调查
item.description: 马来西亚反腐败委员会周日晚些时候发表声明称，该委员会正在调查涉及前总理伊斯梅尔-萨布里-雅各布（Ismail Sabri Yaakob）的贪污和洗钱指控。【原文：The Malaysian Anti-Corruption Commission is investigating allegations of graft and money laundering involving former Prime Minister Ismail Sabri Yaakob, according to a statement late Sunday.】

item.title: 迪拜外籍人士的涌入削弱了丰厚的薪酬待遇和生活方式
item.description: 库珀-费奇（Cooper Fitch）招聘公司的负责人特雷弗-墨菲（Trefor Murphy）回忆说，以前迪拜的招聘启事可能只收到约 100 名应聘者。如今，随着外国人涌入这座以丰厚薪酬和高档生活方式著称的城市，一些招聘广告吸引了多达 2000 名求职者。【原文：Trefor Murphy, the head of recruitment firm Cooper Fitch, recalls a time when a Dubai job posting might have received just about 100 applicants. These days, some draw as many as 2,000 as foreigners flood a city reputed for lucrative paydays and upscale lifestyles.】

item.title: HMD 推出带家长控制和社交媒体锁的手机
item.description: HMD Global Oy 是一家以销售诺基亚品牌手机而闻名的公司，该公司推出了一款新手机，可让父母对孩子上网的时间和方式进行更多控制。【原文：HMD Global Oy, the company known for selling phones under the Nokia brand, unveiled a new handset that will give parents more control over when and how their children get online.】

item.title: 世界银行敦促南非削减劳动和投资方面的繁文缛节
item.description: 世界银行表示，南非应结束 "过度 "的监管负担，并修订黑人所有权法律，以消除困扰其经济的 "瘫痪迹象"。【原文：South Africa should end its “excessive” regulatory burden and revamp its Black-ownership laws to remove the “signs of paralysis” that plague its economy, the World Bank said.】

item.title: 新加坡企业破产达到 2010 年以来最高水平
item.description: 去年，新加坡被迫清盘的公司数量创下历史新高，因为这个城市国家的强制清盘数量激增。【原文：Companies in Singapore were forced to wind-up in record numbers last year, as compulsory liquidations in the city-state soared.】

item.title: 芬兰结束扣押因损坏电缆而被扣押的影子舰队船只
item.description: 12月25日，一艘 "影子船队 "油轮拉起了四条水下数据电缆和一条电力链路，芬兰在调查过程中结束了对这艘油轮的扣押。【原文：Finland has ended the seizure of a shadow fleet tanker that pulled up four underwater data cables and a power link on Dec. 25 as investigations proceed.】

item.title: 中国承诺降低民营企业融资成本
item.description: 中国央行表示，将帮助民营企业控制融资成本，这是中国给予民营企业更多自由的最新举措。【原文：China’s central bank said it will help keep financing costs in check for private companies, in the latest move by the nation to give the sector a freer hand.】

item.title: 航运业利润因美国关税和红海重开而蒸发
item.description: 从 AP Moller-Maersk A/S到中远海运控股有限公司（Cosco Shipping Holdings Co.）等全球航运商去年都获得了暴利，但随着红海航线可能重新开放和美国惩罚性关税的逼近，2025年的命运可能会发生逆转。【原文：Global shippers from AP Moller-Maersk A/S to Cosco Shipping Holdings Co., which logged windfall earnings last year, may see a reversal of fortunes in 2025 as a potential reopening of the Red Sea route and punitive US tariffs loom.】

item.title: 南非科技报》称，非国大计划与埃夫党联手小幅上调南非增值税
item.description: 据《星期日泰晤士报》报道，南非最大的政党计划在本月修订的国家预算中将增值税提高 0.75 个百分点，并警告说如果执政联盟中的政党不支持此举，该党将与执政联盟之外的团体接触。【原文：South Africa’s biggest political party plans a 0.75 percentage-point increase in value-added tax in a revised national budget this month, warning it will approach groups outside the ruling coalition if those in it don’t back the move, the Sunday Times reported.】

item.title: 民调显示大多数泰国人对柏通坦政府没有信心
item.description: 一项民意调查显示，大多数泰国人对总理白通丹-西那瓦（Paetongtarn Shinawatra）的政府没有信心，因为在过去六个月里，政府未能重振陷入困境的国家经济。【原文：Most Thais are not confident in Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra’s government as it has failed to revive the nation’s struggling economy over the past six months, according to an opinion poll.】

item.title: 韩国 1 月房屋销售下滑，未售出房屋堆积如山
item.description: 韩国国土交通部的数据显示，1月份韩国的新房销售量比去年同期大幅下降了46.2%，仅为7440套，这增加了韩国未售出房产的库存量。【原文：New home sales in South Korea plunged 46.2% in January from a year earlier to 7,440, adding to the nation’s stock of unsold properties, according to the Ministry of Land, Infrastructure and Transport.】

item.title: 票价上涨 4.6%，英国火车乘客 "雪上加霜
item.description: 从周日起，英格兰和威尔士的火车票价将上涨约 4.6%，同时铁路卡的价格也将上涨，尽管服务的可靠性创下新低。【原文：Train fares in England and Wales will rise by around 4.6% from Sunday, while railcards become more expensive, despite record low reliability of services.】

item.title: 巴西警方逮捕试图闯入最高法院的男子
item.description: 巴西警方称，有证据表明，一名被指控企图闯入最高法院的男子正在策划 "极端主义行动"。【原文：Brazilian police said there’s evidence that a man accused of attempting to break into the Supreme Court was planning “extremist actions.”】

item.title: 备受关注的中国政策会议交易指南
item.description: 中国股市投资者将迎来关键的一周，因为高层官员将开会讨论经济优先事项，他们对进一步刺激经济以维持今年的强劲涨势寄予厚望。【原文：Chinese stock investors face a pivotal week as top officials meet to discuss economic priorities, with hopes running high for further stimulus to sustain this year’s blistering rally.】

item.title: 煤炭的四年低点隐藏着即将到来的全球供应挤压
item.description: 如今，全球能源价格的疲软掩盖了世界上消耗量最大的电力来源的一个截然不同的未来。【原文：Languishing global prices today mask a very different future for the world’s most-consumed source of power.】

item.title: 三星扩充人工智能手机阵容，推出售价 300 美元的 5G Galaxy 机型
item.description: 三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co.【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. is expanding its range of devices supporting new artificial intelligence features with updated models in its more affordable A series.】

item.title: 斯塔默敦促欧洲面对泽连斯基会谈后的新现实
item.description: 英国首相基尔-斯塔默将告诉欧洲领导人，他们需要面对 "残酷的现实 "并增加国防开支，他试图利用自己进入白宫的渠道来阻止跨大西洋联盟因乌克兰问题而破裂。【原文：Keir Starmer will tell European leaders that they need to face the “brutal reality” and increase defense spending, as the British prime minister sought to use his line into the White House to keep the trans-Atlantic alliance from breaking apart over Ukraine.】

item.title: 美国就业报告将提供雇佣势头线索
item.description: 在联邦政府裁员和消费者支出放缓的情况下，2 月份美国雇主可能以温和的速度增加了就业岗位。【原文：US employers probably added jobs at a moderate pace in February at a time of federal government layoffs and a consumer spending slowdown.】

item.title: Hooters 的问题是对证券化的考验
item.description: 随着 Hooters 濒临破产，TGI Friday's 也深陷破产泥潭，华尔街流行于连锁餐饮业的一种金融工程形式即将面临严峻的压力测试。【原文：A form of Wall Street financial engineering that’s become popular with chain restaurants is about to get a serious stress test, as Hooters heads toward bankruptcy and TGI Friday’s remains mired in one.】

item.title: 特朗普政府关闭奥巴马时代的技术办公室 18F
item.description: 18F是一家致力于改进政府技术的联邦机构，周六，该机构向大约85名员工发出了解雇通知；实际上，这个十年前被誉为山姆大叔的新技术创业公司已经关闭。【原文：Dismissal notices went out Saturday to about 85 employees of 18F, a federal agency that works on improving government technology — effectively shutting down an office hailed a decade ago as Uncle Sam’s new tech startup.】

item.title: 秘鲁 2 月年化通胀率降至 1.5%，符合预期
item.description: 正如经济学家所预期的那样，秘鲁首都利马 2 月份的年化通货膨胀率有所下降，保持在中央银行目标范围的下限。【原文：Annualized inflation in Peru’s capital Lima cooled in February as expected by economists, remaining within the lower end of the central bank’s target band.】

item.title: 比特币创纪录暴跌的所有原因都在这里
item.description: 由于存在多种相互抵消的催化剂，要想准确解读推动比特币价格上涨的因素往往十分困难。【原文：Attempts to decipher exactly what’s driving the price of Bitcoin are often tricky endeavors, with multiple offsetting catalysts in the mix.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税震荡给龙舌兰酒制造商带来了巨大冲击
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对墨西哥的关税威胁时好时坏，让墨西哥标志性龙舌兰酒业的高管们头疼不已。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s on-again, off-again tariff threats against Mexico are giving executives in the country’s iconic tequila industry a splitting headache.】

item.title: 全球风险不断增加，股市面临 "不确定性迷雾
item.description: 本周美国股市发出了一些令人不安的信号，因为投资者在大选后的亢奋情绪遭遇了一些具有挑战性的现实。【原文：The US stock market sent some troubling signals this week as investors’ euphoric post-election vibe slams into a few challenging realities.】
